entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
